NAME: Allies
DESCRIPTION: Important mortal working with you on some issues

NAME: Contacts
DESCRIPTION: How many major contacts your character has

NAME: Fame
DESCRIPTION: How well known your character is and what his fame lets him

NAME: Influence
DESCRIPTION: Your control over a mortal sphere

NAME: Resources
DESCRIPTION: How much money your character has access to

NAME: Loresheet
DESCRIPTION: Your connection with the larger history and legendry of the World of Darkness
